name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Resist him, standing firm in your faith and in the knowledge that your brothers throughout the world are undergoing the same kinds of suffering.

contentJson: ["And after you have suffered for a little while, the God of all grace, who has called you to His eternal glory in Christ,",{"noteId":32},"will Himself restore you, secure you, strengthen you, and establish you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And after you have suffered for a little while, the God of all grace, who has called you to His eternal glory in Christ, will Himself restore you, secure you, strengthen you, and establish you.

contentJson: ["To Him be the power forever and ever. Amen."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To Him be the power forever and ever. Amen.

contentJson: ["Through Silvanus,",{"noteId":33},"whom I regard as a faithful brother, I have written to you briefly, encouraging you and testifying that this is the true grace of God. Stand firm in it."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Through Silvanus, whom I regard as a faithful brother, I have written to you briefly, encouraging you and testifying that this is the true grace of God. Stand firm in it.

contentJson: ["The church in Babylon,",{"noteId":34},"chosen together with you, sends you greetings, as does my son Mark."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The church in Babylon, chosen together with you, sends you greetings, as does my son Mark.

contentJson: ["Greet one another with a kiss of love.",{"lineBreak":true},"Peace to all of you who are in Christ.",{"noteId":35}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Greet one another with a kiss of love. 
Peace to all of you who are in Christ.
